_source.text: 1)it is better use "full path command" 2)define "environment variables" 3)check log file for crond messages 4)check email address of your self(Login Userid) check any message from crond.... 5)check permission of you script(has file execute permission?)

text: 1)it **is** **better** use "full path **command**" 2)define "environment variables" 3)check log file for crond
messages 4)check email address of your self(Login Userid) check any **message** from crond.... 5)check permission of you script(has file execute permission?)
